title: OrganicTextiles Organic Latex Premium Zoned Pillow - Queen Size Set (2-Pack Value)
features: Made from the highest quality 100% Organic Latex, renewable healthy, maintains a comfortable sleeping temperature all night long, includes a removable and washable cotton cover
Pure and Natural, with no artificial or unsafe materials
Unique-zoned design for proper neck support and helps for a better nights rest.
Relieves more pressure than leading foam pillows. Ideal for people that suffer from skin sensitivity.
description: Organic Textiles home items are created with comfort and relaxation as top priority. With GOLS and GOTS certifications on a wide range of our products, our textiles meet high standards to help you create a healthy and eco-friendly home. We acquire our cotton, linen, and latex from eco-conscious suppliers who meet our strict guidelines for health-promoting textiles and ethical processing. All materials used are free from unsafe growth regulators, harsh chemicals, and traditional manufacturing practices to create cleaner and safer products for everyone
